parameter.name: geolocation
parameter.label: GeoLocation
parameter.description: The latitude and longitude separated with a comma (xx.xxxxxx,xx.xxxxxx)

parameter.name: altitude
parameter.label: Altitude
parameter.description: The altitude of the GeoLocation in meter above sea level.

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for positional data calculation in seconds.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.label: Event Offset
parameter.description: Moves an event forward or backward (in minutes)
